flavor: "Did you ever notice how everything goes in cycles? The stuff that's cool now was cool before. That's why I keep copy of everything!" -Princess Space Kitten
text: When your turn begins, place 1 power counter on Trope. [Click], remove Trope from the game: Shuffle 1 card from your heap into your stack for each power counter on Trope.
title: Trope

flavor: Don't you hate it when you know everything before it's even out?
text: Whenever the Corp scores an agenda, he or she trashes the top card of R&D.
title: Spoilers

flavor: "Just a bunch of knockoffs for the touristos. The real designer stuff isn't sold on the street."
text:
When your turn begins, lose 1[Credits].
When the Corp's turn begins, draw 1 card.
title: Drug Dealer

flavor: "I told you to lose my number!"
text:
When you install Rolodex, look at the top 5 cards of your stack and arrange them in any order.
When Rolodex is trashed, trash the top 3 cards of your stack.
title: Rolodex

flavor: Your life is not your own, once you become famous on the Net.
text: Whenever the Corp scores an agenda, add Fan Site to your score area as an agenda worth 0 agenda points.
title: Fan Site

flavor: "My gerbil could write a better screenplay."
text:
Film Critic can host a single agenda.
Whenever you access an agenda, you may host that agenda on Film Critic (the agenda is no longer being accessed and is uninstalled).
[Click],[Click]: Add an agenda hosted on Film Critic to your score area.
title: Film Critic

flavor: "Yeah, we know right where she is. Just pull up Sizzler!"
text:
You are tagged.
Prevent all meat damage.
title: Paparazzi

flavor: "It's our most pirated property ever. Great work, everyone."
text: Whenever the Runner trashes a Corp card (including Ronald Five), he or she loses [Click].
title: Ronald Five

text: As an additional cost to rez Enforcer 1.0, the Corp must forfeit an agenda. The Runner can spend [Click] to break any subroutine on Enforcer 1.0. [Subroutine] Trash 1 program. [Subroutine] Do 1 brain damage. [Subroutine] Trash 1 console. [Subroutine] Trash all virtual resources.
title: Enforcer 1.0

text:
Whenever It's a Trap! is exposed, do 2 net damage.
[Subroutine] The Runner trashes 1 of his or her installed cards. Trash It's a Trap!.
title: It's a Trap!

text: Choose a central server. The runner may initiate a run on that server during which he or she cannot jack out. Otherwise, add An Offer You Can't Refuse to your score area as an agenda worth 1 agenda point.
title: An Offer You Can't Refuse

text: The Runner cannot steal more than one agenda each turn.
title: Haarpsichord Studios: Entertainment Unleashed

text:
If Award Bait is accessed from R&D, the Runner must reveal it.
When the Runner accesses Award Bait, you may place up to 2 advancement tokens on a card that can be advanced.
title: Award Bait

flavor: It's like Lethal Action 3, only with more explosions.
text:
If Explode-a-palooza is accessed from R&D, the Runner must reveal it.
When the Runner accesses Explode-a-palooza, you may gain 5[Credits].
title: Explode-a-palooza

text: When your turn begins, you may pay 1[Credits]. If you do, place 1 advancement token on a card that can be advanced in a server.
title: Early Premiere

text: Install an agenda from HQ faceup and install Casting Call on that agenda as a hosted condition counter with text "Whenever the Runner accesses this agenda, he or she takes 2 tags."
title: Casting Call

text: Agendas accessed from this server cannot be stolen unless the Runner already has a copy of that agenda in his or her score area. This applies even during the run on which the Runner trashes Old Hollywood Grid. Limit 1 region per server.
title: Old Hollywood Grid

text:
Install Hollywood Renovation faceup.
Whenever you advance Hollywood Renovation, you may place 1 advancement token on another card that can be advanced (or 2 advancement tokens instead if there are 6 or more advancement tokens on Hollywood Renovation).
title: Hollywood Renovation

flavor: Sometimes corps have to bury projects, but that doesn't mean they can't make a profit on them.
text: Trash a card installed in a server and gain 3[Credits] for each advancement token on that card.
title: Back Channels

flavor:
EXT. KANSAS – DAY
DOROTHY (Miranda) gazes out at the horizon. A sudden gust of wind catches her hair. Above the windblasted prairie loom ominous STORM CLOUDS.
DOROTHY: If only I wasn't in Kansas anymore. 
She begins to hum a haunting melody.
title: Vanity Project
